name: animal
trans: A living creature that is not a plant or human.

name: brother
trans: A boy who has the same parents as you.

name: candle
trans: A stick of wax with a string through it that gives light when it burns.

name: dance
trans: To move your body to music.

name: earth
trans: The planet we live on; also the soil or ground.

name: forest
trans: A large area with many trees growing close together.

name: giant
trans: Something or someone that is very, very big.

name: happy
trans: Feeling joy and pleasure; not sad.

name: idea
trans: A thought or plan in your mind.

name: jungle
trans: A thick forest in a hot place with many plants and wild animals.

name: kitchen
trans: The room where food is cooked.

name: long
trans: Measuring a great distance from one end to the other.

name: morning
trans: The early part of the day, from when you wake up until noon.

name: neighbor
trans: A person who lives near you.

name: open
trans: To move something so you can see or go through it; not closed.

name: pocket
trans: A small bag sewn into clothing where you can keep things.

name: quiet
trans: Making little or no noise.

name: rabbit
trans: A small furry animal with long ears that hops.

name: school
trans: A place where children go to learn.

name: teacher
trans: A person who helps students learn at school.

name: under
trans: Below or beneath something.

name: visit
trans: To go to see someone or a place.

name: wonder
trans: To think about something or want to know about it.

name: xmas
trans: A short way to write Christmas.

name: yellow
trans: A bright color like the sun or a banana.

name: zebra
trans: An animal that looks like a horse with black and white stripes.

name: above
trans: Higher than something; over it.

name: blue
trans: A color like the sky or the ocean.

name: carry
trans: To hold something and move it from one place to another.

name: door
trans: Something you open and close to go in and out of a room or building.

name: enjoy
trans: To like something and have fun doing it.

name: friend
trans: Someone you like and who likes you; a pal.

name: ground
trans: The surface of the earth that you walk on.

name: house
trans: A building where people live.

name: invite
trans: To ask someone to come to an event or place.

name: jump
trans: To push yourself off the ground with your legs.

name: kindness
trans: Being nice and caring toward others.

name: longer
trans: More long; taking more time or distance.

name: money
trans: Coins and paper bills used to buy things.

name: next
trans: Coming right after this one; the one that follows.

name: over
trans: Above something or on top of it.

name: place
trans: A spot or location; somewhere you can be.

name: question
trans: Something you ask when you want to know information.

name: river
trans: A large stream of water that flows through the land.

name: snow
trans: White frozen water that falls from the sky in winter.

name: tree
trans: A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves.

name: uncle
trans: The brother of your mother or father.

name: very
trans: A word that means really or a lot.

name: world
trans: The Earth and all the people and places on it.

name: young
trans: Not old; in the early part of life.

name: zero
trans: The number that means none or nothing; 0.

name: again
trans: One more time; another time.

name: brown
trans: A color like wood, chocolate, or dirt.

name: child
trans: A young boy or girl.

name: dark
trans: Having little or no light; not bright.

name: early
trans: Before the usual or expected time; near the beginning.

name: famous
trans: Known by many people; well-known.

name: garden
trans: A piece of ground where you grow flowers, fruits, or vegetables.

name: hill
trans: A raised area of land that is smaller than a mountain.

name: inside
trans: In or into a building or container; not outside.

name: job
trans: Work that someone does to earn money.

name: king
trans: A man who rules a country.

name: listen
trans: To pay attention to sounds or what someone is saying.

name: market
trans: A place where people buy and sell food and other things.

name: north
trans: The direction toward the top of a map; opposite of south.

name: once
trans: One time; happening one time only.

name: paper
trans: A thin, flat material used for writing or drawing.

name: quietly
trans: In a way that makes little or no noise.

name: road
trans: A path that cars and people use to travel.

name: summer
trans: The warmest season of the year.

name: today
trans: This day; the day we are in now.

name: until
trans: Up to the time when something happens.

name: visit
trans: To go to see someone or a place.

name: winter
trans: The coldest season of the year.

name: x-ray
trans: A special picture that shows the inside of your body, like your bones.

name: yesterday
trans: The day before today.

name: all
trans: Every one of something; the whole amount.

name: black
trans: The darkest color, like the night sky.

name: come
trans: To move toward someone or something.

name: done
trans: Finished; completed.

name: easy
trans: Not hard to do; simple.

name: farmer
trans: A person who grows crops and raises animals on a farm.

name: goose
trans: A large water bird that is bigger than a duck.

name: horse
trans: A large animal with four legs that people can ride.

name: important
trans: Something that matters a lot and is very special.

name: joyful
trans: Full of happiness and joy.

name: keep
trans: To continue to have something; not to give it away.

name: love
trans: A very strong feeling of caring about someone or something.

name: morning
trans: The early part of the day, from when you wake up until noon.

name: night
trans: The time when it is dark outside and most people sleep.

name: openly
trans: In a way that is not hidden; honestly.

name: part
trans: A piece of something; not the whole thing.

name: queen
trans: A woman who rules a country or is married to a king.

name: riverbank
trans: The land along the side of a river.

name: school
trans: A place where children go to learn.

name: together
trans: With each other; in the same place.

name: umbrella
trans: Something you hold over your head to stay dry in the rain.

name: village
trans: A small town in the country with houses and shops.

name: water
trans: A clear liquid that we drink and that fills rivers and oceans.

name: zest
trans: Great excitement and energy; enthusiasm.
